entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Varennes

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries this evening and ending after midnight then clearing. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
